doc:
Blake Butler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blake_Butler 0 John David Blake Butler (22 October 1924 – 15 April 1981) was an English actor best known for his regular role as Mr. Wainwright during the first three series of Last of the Summer Wine between 1973 and 1976. In addition, Butler made guest appearances on such programmes as Dad's Army, Doctor at Large, Bless This House, The Good Life, Paul Temple, George and Mildred and Grange Hill. Crossroads 1967 playing assistant manager Maurice. Raine John_David_Blake_Butler ( 22_October_1924 – 15_April_1981 ) was an_English_actor best_known for his_regular_role as Mr._Wainwright during the_first_three_series of Last of the_Summer_Wine between 1973_and_1976 . In addition , Butler made guest_appearances on such_programmes as Dad 's_Army , Doctor at Large_,_Bless_This_House , The_Good_Life , Paul_Temple , George_and_Mildred and Grange_Hill . Crossroads 1967 playing assistant_manager_Maurice .
